post_text: April 21, 2017 at 1:18 PM#1HiI've noticed a strange behavior.I can do assign fixture 1.1 /posx=10, then it changes in setup my position x for fixture 1 (and its subfixture 1), but it doesn't change in stage view nore in fixture properties (list fixture 1) until i reload my show.Is there an explanation ?Thanks.
